snippet.title: Unstoppable Gorg - launch trailer (720p HD)
snippet.description:
PC & Mac  http://bit.ly/Gorg-Steam  Now free on iPad:  http://bit.ly/Gorg-iPad

DANGER! Earth is under attack from a vast armada of flying saucers. Only you can stop the invasion of these relentless alien monsters - don't let a single one through! 

Get ready for a revolution in tower defense that will send you spinning. Defend the solar system by sending satellites into orbit around planets, moons and space stations. Create the perfect defense by rotating orbits to move your satellites into the best positions. 

Do you have what it takes to defeat the Gorg and save the solar system? Find out in more than 40 levels of thrilling tower defense action inspired by classic sci-fi movies from the 1950s.

GORG - Earth's arch nemesis, the vile and vicious King Gorg, is played by Jani Joki, head of Futuremark's benchmark team. Gorg's head was constructed from an old gas mask and a cycling helmet, see how in this 'making of' photo diary: http://imgur.com/a/Tg3D9#0
 
RADIANT BEEM - The towering metal leader of the Sunbots is played by Jaakko Haapaslo, head of Futuremark Games Studio. The robot suit was built from bits and pieces from IKEA, see how in this 'making of' photo diary: http://imgur.com/a/Kx8r2#0
 
SEREIA - The seductive temptress Sereia is played by LouLou D'vil, Finland's premier burlesque dancer. Her exotic beauty, blazing eyes and passionate charisma have made her one of the brightest performance artists in Europe. Can you resist her? http://www.louloudvil.com/

Awesome music by Stakula - http://www.stakula.com/

Follow Unstoppable Gorg on Facebook for behind the scenes footage and photos, dev diaries, giveaways and more: http://www.facebook.com/unstoppablegorg/
